message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000! It's a great opportunity to get a unique item at a fixed price. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I trust your confidence in the product and am willing to make the purchase.

As you know, I've had a great track record so far, and I'm confident this one will exceed your expectations. However, I want to be upfront with you - this one's a bit pricier than the last one. I'm looking for $10000, and I think it's worth every penny. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this premium product?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the previous experience, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

Considering the unique nature of the product and the discount offered, I believe it's worth taking the risk and making the purchase.
